master.comment: Everything between the 'cformat' tags comprises a C language format statement and will be used as such.

cformat.htmlfn: // the html filename, accept default or change it. index.html
cformat.printmargins: /* These are the page setup margins you will use when printing the generated html. Change the numbers as required. */ mm // do not change the unit! 10 10 10 10
cformat.title: // change this text, it's both 'title' and front page header this is the title
